ComicInfo.Summary:
The writer and artist behind the bestest Deadpool comics in existence reunite to tell the hella screwed-up story of a giant monster…with very physical needs. San Francisco is under threat from King Dong, if you will. Our entire world is threatened by this monster and its gross needs. Frank Gray foretold this monster’s coming, and now it’s up to him to bring matters to a climax…with the help of a mothballed mecha from the Disco Era. It’s a giant monster attack like you’ve never seen before, or ever will again.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-25 11:34:04. [Issue ID 990319]
